question: Which organizations are utilizing multi-cloud strategies while emphasizing employee development in their recent job postings?

subtasks.task: Identify organizations that are utilizing multi-cloud strategies. [CompanyTechStack]
Find recent job postings that emphasize employee development from the identified organizations. [CompanyHiringDetail]
Cross-reference the organizations with the job postings to identify those that meet both criteria. [CompanyTechStack, CompanyHiringDetail]
